quotes.quote: Constant togetherness is fine - but only for Siamese twins.
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
If you want to go quickly, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
In mere moments of togetherness, families forge their most indelibe memories.
Togetherness is a substitute sense of community, a counterfeit communion.
Fight for every moment of togetherness with your family, for far more circumstances deny you the priviledge than ever make it feasible.
When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
We are all in this together. We will all make it or none of us will make it. If everyone cleans up their act except one big ole country, it isn't going to work.
I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things.
Let there be spaces in your togetherness.
We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately.
People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
Birds of the same feathers flock together, and when they flock together they fly so high.
We cannot accomplish all that we need to do without working together.
If we don't have each other, we go crazy with loneliness. When we do, we go crazy with togetherness.
I'm just like everyone. I like to feel togetherness with someone.
Determined people working together can do anything.
Eagles fly alone, but sheep flock together.
Behold, how good and pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity.
Feathers are light; but when they come together, they become heavy!
In our togetherness (as a team) castles are built.
Perhaps only those people who are capable of real togetherness have that look of being alone in the world.
A family is only as strong as its commitment to togetherness.
A snowflake is one of God's most fragile creations, but look what they can do when they stick together!
